resources.string:
User Guide:
 
 Once CALIBRATED, Flip over and touch the stylus to start. 
 
 Use VOLUME DOWN button for the tool action in simulator
 
 When the tool gets stuck inside tissue, flip up the phone and recalibrate to reset.

User Guide:
 
 1. Do not Open this app until you have started the simulation in SOFA (otherwise you need to force stop this app)
 
 2. Click CALIBRATE button, then Flip over your phone and touch the stylus to start. 
 
 3. Use VOLUME DOWN button on your phone for the tool action in SOFA
 
 4. When the tool gets stuck inside tissue, flip up the phone and recalibrate to reset.

Setup Guide:
 
 1. Connect to the remote server via Teamviewer(id:595354208)
 
 2. Enter your PC server ip address and port number ( Refer to SOFA/myIpAddress.txt on your PC ).
 
 3. Start the simulation (SPACEBAR) in SOFA on your PC 
 
 4. Point your phone to your PC screen and click CALIBRATE button 
 
 5. Select Instrument 1 (or 2), then Flip over your phone (facing down) and touch the stylus to start. 
 
 6. When the tool gets stuck inside tissue, flip up the phone and recalibrate to reset.
Not connected to a WIFI network.
